TopicTitle: Discussion/Question: What do Kerbals do besides spaceflight?

Articles.Content:
We all know that Kerbals go into space and stuff.

But what do kerbals eat? what are their snacks made out of?

Where do they live? What do their houses look like? Do they have grocery stores? Kerbal Walmart?

Do they play video games? Board games? 

What does the average kerbal do? Mow the lawn? Feed the dog, if they have dogs?

What is life like on Kerbin?

You guys get to answer that, and be creative.

Well, they definitely play video games, as in a loading screen picture Jeb is playing KSP, and and the level one (or two) Astronaut Complex, a computer screen has KSP on it. And they play board games, as there’s a whole cabinet dedicated to it in the Hitchhiker habitat.

On 12/21/2023 at 3:17 PM, Kerbalsaurus said:

Well, they definitely play video games, as in a loading screen picture Jeb is playing KSP, and and the level one (or two) Astronaut Complex, a computer screen has KSP on it. And they play board games, as there’s a whole cabinet dedicated to it in the Hitchhiker habitat.

yes. I'm already imagining Jeb and Bill stuck somewhere on Eve playing Ketris.

Well, they definitely play video games, as in a loading screen picture Jeb is playing KSP, and and the level one (or two) Astronaut Complex, a computer screen has KSP on it. And they play board games, as there’s a whole cabinet dedicated to it in the Hitchhiker habitat.

Don't forget the pool table! Also I think this sounds like a really fun world building project, so I'll see what I can make of it!
I assume that they eat peanuts, because that's what JPL does for good luck at their launches/landings
